TopicTitle: Need help installing EVE/Edge of Oblivion

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I need help installing this mod, I did already try it a few times I did watch the tutorial I did read the information but I don't succeed. I also don't understand why I need to instal EVE first before why can't I just put those folders in the GameData folder?

Thank you for time and help.

Rowns.

Edited September 9, 2014 by Vanamonde

Moved to modded support, so the right people will see it.

Edited September 9, 2014 by Vanamonde

You must install EVE first because Astronomer's Pack replaces some, but not all of the EVE files. You'll need to merge the folders keeping the newer files, but how you do that depends on your operating system. Which operating system do you use?

Step 1: Install EVE.

Step 2: Choose a resolution, then go into the folders until you find BoulderCo. While holding Option, click and drag BoulderCo into your KSP/GameData/ folder. Choose Merge or Keep Newer.

Step 3: Do the same Option+click&drag with the BoulderCo folder in the Step 3 folder.

For many mods, as long as you go into the KSP/GameData/ folder, you don't need to merge anything, but you'll need to use your own judgment. I recommend avoiding merging as much as possible, since that will help you learn how the mod's folders work, making it easier to solve installation problems.
Thank you very much I will try it another time.
